parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Load [[HTML File Format|HTML]] from file or Uri using given control. File path is relative to current mission dir or an absolute path (with drive letter etc.). The command is subject to restrictions, imposed by [[CfgCommands]] class.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Warning </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> For unknown reasons, URL's length is limited to 255 characters.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control [[htmlLoad]] filename

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> filename: [[String]] - local file name or remote file URL

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[htmlLoad]] "briefing.html";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_control [[htmlLoad]] "<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>http://www.bistudio.com/newsfeed/arma3_news.php?build=main&language=English</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>"; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>[http://www.bistudio.com/newsfeed/arma3_news.php?build<template><title>=</title></template>main&language<template><title>=</title></template>English link]</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Display news item:<code>[] [[spawn]] {
	[[disableSerialization]];
	_html = [[findDisplay]] 46 [[createDisplay]] "RscCredits" [[ctrlCreate]] ["RscHTML", -1];
	_html [[ctrlSetBackgroundColor]] [0,0,0,0.8];
	_html [[ctrlSetPosition]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[safeZoneX]], [[safeZoneY]], [[safeZoneW]], [[safeZoneH]]];
	_html [[ctrlCommit]] 0;
	_html [[htmlLoad]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>"http://www.bistudio.com/newsfeed/arma3_news.php?build=main&language=English"</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>;
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlHTMLLoaded]], [[loadFile]], [[preprocessFile]], [[preprocessFileLineNumbers]], [[HTML File Format]]
</value></part></template>

[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on September 7, 2014 - 18:02 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:BrotherhoodOfHam|BrotherhoodOfHam]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
<br>htmlLoad works with URL's as well as html files.
</dd>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on September 7, 2014 - 19:35 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Killzone Kid|Killzone Kid]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
While surprisingly [[htmlLoad]] does work with URLs as pointed above, the operation is blocking, meaning the whole game will freeze until the operation is complete. Therefore it is not recommended to use this command in such way.
</dd>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on April 21, 2015 - 18:08 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Benargee|Benargee]]</dt>
<dd class="note">Example use of URL can be found in [[BIS_fnc_GUInewsfeed]] with the function browser.
</dd>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on October 7, 2015 - 22:03 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Tupolov|Tupolov]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
(Arma 3) In order to use URLs, they must be included in CfgCommands -> allowedHTMLLoadURIs. In order to use URIs with params a wildcard * character is supported:<br><br>
'''Script Example''':
<code>_newsOnline = <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>"http://alivemod.com/alive_news.php?map=" + _map + "&mission=" + _mission + "&player=" + _player;</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>
_ctrlHTML htmlLoad _newsOnline;</code>
'''Config Example:'''<br>
<ext><name>syntaxhighlight</name><attr> lang="cpp"</attr><inner>
class CfgCommands {
   allowedHTMLLoadURIs[] += {
      "http://alivemod.com/alive_news.php*"
   };
};</inner><close></syntaxhighlight></close></ext>
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
